title: Saving the Prince Regent - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Androgynous Characters   Anti-social Protagonist   Beast Companions   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cohabitation   Cold Love Interests   Cooking   Cross-dressing   Cute Story   Determined Protagonist   Different Social Status   Doctors   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Hiding True Identity   Marriage   Marriage of Convenience   Medical Knowledge   Mysterious Family Background   Overpowered Protagonist   Pets   Poisons   Pragmatic Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Slow Romance   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests
author: Flower Heart   花心者
description:
On one fateful morning, Zhao Xi stumbles upon a heavily injured man on the Phoenix Mountain, unaware it was none other than the Prince Regent who held power over the land and fell into misfortune. In a plight of her own to detract potential marriages, Zhao Xi offers to save the man on one condition: he must be her husband for a year.

Her days begin to slowly burn away between taking care of the fussy bear, Ping An, and her taciturn companion.>
